thread.title: Obama to lobby Dems at Capitol
thread.title_full: Obama to lobby Dems at Capitol

author: Jordan Fabian and Cristina Marcos
title: Obama to lobby Dems at Capitol
text: Obama to lobby Dems at Capitol By Jordan Fabian and Cristina Marcos - 06/12/15 09:06 AM EDT President Obama will go to Capitol Hill on Friday to persuade skeptical Democrats to back his trade agenda ahead of a critical series of votes. Obama will address House Democrats at a morning meeting, according to a Democratic aide. just hours before the House is set to vote on fast-track trade authority. ADVERTISEMENT Fast-track would help the president advance a sweeping Pacific Rim trade pact by preventing Congress from amending it. Past: 1 day House Democrat says Obama has lost... Rep.
